Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Darmanian Way, north of Pandora's Apothecary and the Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The Evenborough Inn is located on the southern side of the road. The entrance to the Inn is on the other side of the building, off of Evenborough Way or Hofton Avenue. On the south side of the road is Pandora's Apothocary, where various, mysterious potions and oils can be bought for just about any purpose.
